user.topics: SELECT id_topic FROM topic WHERE topic_user = %s WHERE topic_forum = %s;
user.messages_simple: SELECT m.message_message FROM messages AS m JOIN topic AS t ON m.message_topic = t.id_topic WHERE m message_user = %s AND t.topic_forum = %s AND m.message_citation = 0;
user.messages_citation: SELECT m.message_message FROM messages AS m JOIN topic AS t ON m.message_topic = t.id_topic WHERE m message_user = %s AND t.topic_forum = %s AND m.message_citation = 1;
user.messages_all: SELECT m.message_message FROM messages AS m JOIN topic AS t ON m.message_topic = t.id_topic WHERE m message_user = %s AND t.topic_forum = %s

touser.topics: SELECT DISTINCT t.id_topic FROM messages AS m JOIN topic AS t ON m.message_topic = t.id_topic WHERE m.message_user = %s AND m.message_toUser = %s AND t.topic_forum = %s;
touser.messages_all: SELECT m.message_message FROM messages AS m JOIN onchois AS u ON m.message_user = u.onchois_id JOIN topic AS t ON m.message_topic = t.id_topic WHERE u.onchois_id = %s AND t.topic_forum = %s AND m.message_toUser = %s;

on_topic.messages_simple: SELECT * FROM messages WHERE message_user = %s AND message_topic = %s AND message_citation = 0;
on_topic.messages_citation: SELECT * FROM messages WHERE message_user = %s AND message_topic = %s AND message_citation = 1;
on_topic.messages_all: SELECT * FROM messages WHERE message_user = %s AND message_topic = %s;
